# shouldCloseDocument

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver necessarily closes the associated document when the window it manages is closed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var shouldCloseDocument: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver necessarily closes the associated document when the window it manages is closed, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Closing the Window

- **close()**: Closes the window if it was loaded.
